summary: This document is a UBS Client Relationship Agreement and account opening package for Ghislaine Maxwell, establishing multiple RMA Domestic - Sole Owner accounts. It details her personal information, employment, net worth, investment profile, and includes her signed agreement to the terms, including arbitration clauses and margin agreements.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The sole owner and primary account holder for multiple UBS Resource Management Accounts (RMA). The document contains her personal information, financial details, and her signature on the agreement.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Listed as a Financial Advisor for Ghislaine Maxwell, with contact information provided in the electronic delivery consent section.

persons.name: Lyle Casriel
persons.context: Listed as a Financial Advisor for Ghislaine Maxwell, with contact information provided in the electronic delivery consent section.

connections.description: Scott Stackman is listed as a Financial Advisor for Ghislaine Maxwell's UBS accounts.
Lyle Casriel is listed as a Financial Advisor for Ghislaine Maxwell's UBS accounts.

events.title: Account Agreement Execution
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell signs the UBS Client Relationship Agreement, opening multiple RMA Domestic - Sole Owner accounts.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell listed her employer as 'The TerraMar Project' with a business address in New York, NY.
She reported an annual income range of $200,000 - $499,999, liquid assets of $10,000,000 AND ABOVE, and a net worth (excluding primary residence) of $10,000,000 AND ABOVE.
The document includes a signed arbitration clause, waiving the right to sue in court and agreeing to resolve disputes through FINRA arbitration.
Maxwell consented to electronic delivery of account documents to the email address 'gmaxl0ellmax.com'.
The agreement covers ten separate 'RMA Domestic - Sole Owner' accounts, indicating a significant banking relationship with UBS.
